issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on photo gallery does not open up anything.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the Photo Gallery table row.
7.You will see that nothing happens & we do not get any page further.

Actual result:
1.Tapping on photo gallery does not open up anything.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on Photo Gallery should open up a page with a prompt to select a photo.
2.You should see the photo in the window view.
3.Move & scale down the photo & then tap on Use.
4.You should get in the console message like [INFO] PHOTO GALLERY SUCCESS cropRect.x cropRect.y cropRect.height cropRect.width.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Phone-->PhotoGallery:Tapping on photo gallery table row does not open up anything.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
